Legal Disclaimer ‚Äì Adriano Imperador Token

This website and the materials contained herein are provided for informational purposes only and do not constitute legal, financial, accounting, tax, or investment advice. The Adriano Imperador Token is a strictly utility-based fan token with a community engagement purpose, and does not promise financial returns, value appreciation, or profit-sharing.

Ownership of the token does not represent any equity interest, security, or governance right within the project. It is intended for community interaction and access to specific digital features, such as gamification, voting, NFTs, and exclusive experiences.

Users acknowledge that engaging with blockchain, tokens, and digital assets carries technological, regulatory, and market risks, and they assume full responsibility for their decisions. We strongly recommend consulting a qualified professional before making any decisions based on the information provided.

privacy_policy_-_in_english.html:
Privacy Policy ‚Äì Adriano Imperador Token

Last updated: 16.05.2025

This Privacy Policy complies with Brazil‚Äôs General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law No. 13.709/2018), the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), and other relevant privacy regulations. By using services related to the Adriano Imperador Token, you acknowledge and agree to the practices described herein and authorize the processing of your personal data according to the purposes defined below.

1. Data Collected

We may collect the following types of data based on your interaction with the platform:

a) Data required for basic platform use:

  • Username or nickname;
  • Email address;
  • Country of origin;
  • Public wallet address (blockchain).

b) Data for gamification and community engagement:

  • Navigation data (cookies, IP address, device type);
  • User activity (ranking participation, votes, draws, etc.).

c) Data for shipping physical prizes:
If you win a giveaway or promotion with a physical reward, we may collect:

  • Full name;
  • Full shipping address;
  • Phone number;
  • National ID or Tax ID (if required for delivery or tax purposes).

This information will only be requested when absolutely necessary for shipping and will be retained only as long as required for fulfillment.

2. Purpose of Data Use

Your data is used to:

  • Enable gamification features and community interaction;
  • Run raffles, distribute NFTs, and manage rewards;
  • Send project updates and communications;
  • Fulfill legal and tax obligations (for physical shipments);
  • Ensure platform security and prevent fraud;
  • Conduct internal analytics to improve the service.

3. Data Sharing

Your data may be shared with:

  • Logistics providers, when shipping prizes;
  • Technical partners, for platform maintenance and operation;
  • Authorities, if required by law or regulations.

We do not sell or trade your personal data.

4. Data Retention and Deletion

Data is retained only as long as necessary. Data collected for prize fulfillment will be deleted after completion of the delivery, unless legal retention is required (e.g., tax records).

You may request deletion of your data unless retention is required by law.

5. Data Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data. However, due to the decentralized nature of blockchain, users are responsible for securing their own wallets, passwords, and personal devices.

6. User Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access, correct, or delete your data;
  • Revoke consent at any time;
  • Request details about how your data is being used.

Requests must be sent to adrianoimperadortoken@gmail.com and will be answered within 10 business days.

7. Cookies

We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, personalize content, and gather usage statistics. You may disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect some functionality.

8. International Transfers

As a blockchain-based platform, certain actions (such as on-chain transactions) may involve servers outside your country. We ensure all data transfers comply with applicable privacy laws.

9. Changes to this Policy

This Policy may be updated at any time. We recommend checking it periodically. Significant changes will be announced via our official communication channels.

10. Contact

For questions, requests, or concerns related to this policy, please contact:

üìß adrianoimperadortoken@gmail.com
üåê www.imperadortoken.com

Cookie Notice

We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website, personalize content, analyze traffic, and remember your preferences.

By continuing to browse imperadortoken.com, you agree to the use of cookies as described in our Privacy Policy.

You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through your browser settings.

‚úÖ Accept all cookies
‚öôÔ∏è Manage preferences

terms_of_use_-_in_english.html:
Terms of Use ‚Äì Official Website of Adriano Imperador Token

Last updated: [Date]

These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of the official website of the Adriano Imperador Token (hereinafter referred to as ‚ÄúPlatform‚Äù), available at www.imperadortoken.com. By browsing or using any feature of this website, you fully agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, we recommend that you do not use our services.

1. Project Overview

The Adriano Imperador Token is a utility fan token focused on delivering exclusive fan experiences through gamification, digital rewards (including NFTs), and optional promotional giveaways. A portion of the financial proceeds may be allocated to social initiatives personally selected by the football legend Adriano Imperador, as announced during specific campaigns.

2. Access to the Platform

Use of the Platform is permitted only to individuals with legal capacity. Use by minors is prohibited unless under proper supervision or legal authorization. Users are solely responsible for the accuracy of any information provided when navigating or engaging with Platform activities.

3. Available Features

The Platform may offer the following:

  • Wallet connection for token or NFT interactions;
  • Participation in gamified events and ranking systems;
  • Access to promotional giveaways with published rules;
  • Exclusive NFT drops;
  • Community voting on fan-related decisions;
  • Transparency tools for tracking social fund allocations;
  • Integrations with third-party Web3 tools and marketplaces.

Note: Features are subject to change at any time and may have individual rules and limitations, defined by the project team.

4. Intellectual Property

All content on the Platform‚Äîincluding logos, texts, images, official NFTs, trademarks, and visual elements‚Äîare the exclusive property of the Adriano Imperador Token project and/or its licensors. Reproduction, distribution, or modification is strictly prohibited without express written consent.

5. Promotions and Giveaways

Giveaways hosted by the Platform are intended exclusively for fan engagement and promotional purposes. Each giveaway will be governed by specific terms outlining eligibility, deadlines, and delivery of prizes. The project reserves the right to modify, suspend, or cancel any promotional campaign at its sole discretion.

6. NFTs and Digital Assets

NFTs made available through the Platform may represent collectibles, exclusive experiences, or digital perks. They do not constitute securities, financial instruments, or guarantees of value appreciation. Holding an NFT does not grant any corporate ownership or legal governance rights in the project.

7. Wallet Use and Blockchain Interaction

The Platform operates through decentralized wallet integration (e.g., Phantom, Solflare), fully under user control. The project does not access or store private keys. All blockchain transactions are irreversible, and users are responsible for safeguarding their wallet credentials.

8. Privacy and Data Protection

Use of the Platform is subject to our Privacy Policy, available. By using the Platform, you consent to the collection and processing of your data in accordance with applicable data protection laws, including Brazil‚Äôs LGPD and international standards such as the GDPR.

9. User Responsibilities

You agree to:

  • Use the Platform ethically and legally;
  • Avoid attempting to exploit or disrupt the system or integrations;
  • Not use the Platform for illegal or fraudulent purposes;
  • Take full responsibility for actions tied to your wallet.

10. Disclaimer of Liability

The project is not liable for:

  • Blockchain or third-party network failures;
  • Loss of wallet access or credentials;
  • Market value fluctuations of the token or NFTs;
  • Decisions made based on unverified claims or unofficial information.

11. Updates to the Terms

We reserve the right to update these Terms at any time. Updates will be published on the Platform, and continued use of the Platform after such updates will constitute acceptance of the revised Terms.

12. Governing Law and Jurisdiction

These Terms are governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of the city of Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, to the exclusion of any other jurisdiction.

13. Contact

For questions or support regarding these Terms, please contact:
üìß support@imperadortoken.com
üåê www.imperadortoken.com
